ValidationRule.description: case 31148623 - Prevent an HRS 401k rcd type from changing to HRS 401k FSS rcd type until Status is Sold
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) && $RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity FSS Record Type' && NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Sold'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity must be marked SOLD before you can change the record type.
